name: Bullet42 VR
description:
Description:

In Bullet42 you control a high-tech bullet, that has one goal - kill the supreme general of an invading army. Move your body around to control the bullet and evade all obstacles on the battlefield in order to reach your target in this fast-paced VR masterpiece of a game.

Controls:

Press B on the right controller to shoot the gun.

Press A on the right controller to re-center while in the menu or to go back to menu if in level.

Move your Body/Head to control the bullet

Have fun!
